radiographic_examinations.findings: The visualized lung fields are within normal limits; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion; liver shows homogenous attenuation with no focal lesions; pancreas normal with no focal lesions; spleen normal; adrenal glands normal; kidneys normal with no focal lesions or hydronephrosis; appendix dilated up to 9 mm with adjacent fat stranding and fascial thickening; wall thickening of the terminal ileum; no bowel obstruction; urinary bladder and distal ureters unremarkable; no retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy; no abdominal aortic aneurysm; no significant atherosclerotic disease; no evidence of osseous lesions or acute fracture; midline ventral upper abdominal fat containing hernia with a 15 x 9 mm defect.
